name: Suunto MC-2 NH Mirror Compass
description: A reliable tool to keep you on your way, this compass has features for the Northern hemisphere including adjustable declination and clinometer.High-grade steel needle with jewel bearing.Adjustable declination.Liquid filled offers smooth and stable operation.Mirror for sighting bearings and signaling.Sighting hole and notch for accurate bearings.Clinometer.Luminescent markings for working in low light.Metric UTM scales and inch ruler.Baseplate with magnifying lens.Detachable snap-lock lanyard with wristlock. Easy to detach for working with the map.
